experience-section.title: Experience what Rarimo can do
experience-section.subtitle: Empowering the multichain universe to realize its full potential
experience-section.access-text: Access cross-chain network data and allow dynamic interactions
experience-section.interoperability-text: Moving Digital assets or in-game items across different ecosystems
experience-section.liquidity-text: Easily access liquidity across chains, reducing the gas requirements.

user-cases-section.title: User Cases
user-cases-section.subtitle: Enable seamless user experience with a single click interactions
user-cases-section.nft-settlement-text: Users can buy NFTs using their token of choice from any supported blockchain in a single transaction — with the lowest fees.
user-cases-section.borrowing-text: Rarimo integrates with lending platforms, enabling collateralized or uncollateralized lending across different blockchain.
user-cases-section.asset-verification-text: Allowing to retrieve and publish timestamped proofs about an NFT’s state and activities.
user-cases-section.airdrop-text: The collection owner sends only one transaction to lock tokens and users can redeem tokens in any chain.
user-cases-section.staking-text: Create investment strategy and publish it as a smart contract, to be executed automatically across chains.
